online.game
Class HiddenGameWindow

java.lang.Object
  vnc.OffscreenWindow
      online.game.HiddenGameWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config, CommonConfig, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, ImageLoader.ImageConsumer, MenuParentInterface, MouseClient, SizeProvider, UniversalConstants, VncEventInterface, VncInterface, VncServiceProvider
public class HiddenGameWindow
extends OffscreenWindow

hidden game windows, show the private information for players. and provide a hook for actions based on the hidden information The general contract is that everything done by the hidden window could be done in the main game window, possibly by exposing some of the hidden information. We share the run loop with the main game. The hidden windows are positioned to the left of the real window, so mouse activity on the real screen can't affect them, and we can determine which hidden window is feeding the events to the main window by checking the x,y coordinates of the action.

Author:
Ddyer
